name: Maker Plugins
description: Plugins that add play-test development tools!

scrapedData.title: Super Tools Engine – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin is the core of all maker-style plugins; it adds a playtest editor that can be opened with F12 while playtesting.

scrapedData.title: HUD Maker – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows developers to create their own map-based HUD through an in-game GUI window!

pluginData.title: HUD Maker Multiline Text – MV Plugin
pluginData.description: Adds the "Multiline Text" component to MV HUD Maker!

scrapedData.title: Plugin Updater – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin adds a tool to the Super Tools Engine that checks for updates on plugins from SumRndmDde’s library.

name: Title
description: These are plugins that make changes to the title screen!

scrapedData.title: Title Command Customizer – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
This Plugin allows customization over the Title Command Window!
You can customize the size, position, rows, columns, and commands!

scrapedData.title: Title Picture Choices – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin requires the Title Command Customizer.

scrapedData.title: Title Map Background – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows developers to set a map to be used as the background of their title screen.

scrapedData.title: Press Start – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: A very simple Plugin that sets up a “Press Start” scene before opening up the Command Window on the Title Screen.

name: Remove Faded Continue Choice
description: Removes the “Continue” choice from the Title Screen when there is no save file saved. (View)

name: Remove Title Screen
description: Completely removes the Title Screen from the game. Going to the Title Screen starts a New Game automatically. (View)

name: Skip Title Screen Without Save File
description: Skips the Title Screen if there are no saved files. (View)

name: Menu Plugins
description: These are plugins that preform some sort of manipulation on the game’s menu!

scrapedData.title: Menu Status Customizer – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Allows you to have more customization over the Actor Statuses that appear in the main part of the menu.

scrapedData.title: Gold Window Customizer – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: A Plugin that allows you to manipulate the information presented on the Gold Window.

scrapedData.title: Menu Backgrounds – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Allows you to add/customize backgrounds and change window opacity for all menu scenes.

scrapedData.title: In-Menu Usage Upgrade – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: A Plugin that allows you to customize the Window for when the Player uses an Item or Skill in the menu and it requires an Actor to be selected.

name: Alt Menu Plugins
description: These are plugins that change the entire format of the game’s menu.

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Right – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Five very simple alternative menu screens for your game!

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Down – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Five very simple alternative menu screens for your game!

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Up – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Five very simple alternative menu screens for your game!

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Face – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Five very simple alternative menu screens for your game!

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: List – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Five very simple alternative menu screens for your game!

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Phantasia – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Adds an alternative menu screen based off of the one from Tales of Phantasia.

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Bust Select – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: An alternative menu screen that uses “busts” as the main form of Actor selection. Also contains an HP Bar window and Side-View Battler window.

name: Alternative Menu Screen: Busts and Icons

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Busts and Icons – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Using this Plugin, you can allow the player to select a Character from a list of available characters. You can set an image file that contains Characters and the index of the Character you wish to use within that file.

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Info Box – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Adds an alternative menu screen based off of the “Face” menu but also adds more information including Playtime, Location, Current Background Music, and more!

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Mobile – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Adds an alternative menu screen that is built to be more effective on mobile devices.

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Icons – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: An alternative menu screen that uses Icons in order to list the Command Window choices. All of the Icons can be customized and Icons for custom commands can be added also.

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Icon Cycle – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: An alternative menu screen that uses Icons in order to list the Command Window choices. All of the Icons can be customized and Icons for custom commands can be added also.

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Final Fantasy 7 – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: A Plugin that gives your game a menu based off of the menu from Final Fantasy 7. “Play Time” and “Location” displays have been added along with a “To Next Level” bar.

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Kingdom Hearts – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: An alternative menu based off of the menu from Kingdom Hearts.

scrapedData.title: Alt Menu Screen: Face Bars – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Adds HP, MP, and TP bars to the Face-styled alt menu screens I have created. Simply install both a Face Menu and this Plugin underneath it to use it.

name: Battle Plugins
description: These are plugins that manipulate various aspects of battles.

scrapedData.title: Battle GUI Core – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows developers to customize the window set up of battles within their game.

scrapedData.title: Battle Status Customizer – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin gives developers control over the information provided within the Battle Status windows for each Actor.

scrapedData.title: Skill Extender – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows developers to create skills that prompt players to make a second input after the original skill input.

scrapedData.title: Battle End Events – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows Common Events to be played at the end of the battle depending on the results.

scrapedData.title: Walk Character Battlers – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows developers to use Walk Character images as side-view battlers for Actors and Enemies.

scrapedData.title: Summon Core – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows developers to create skills that summon Actors into the player’s party using various parameters.

scrapedData.title: Summon Battler Images – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin requires the Summon Core.

scrapedData.title: Replace Summons – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin requires the Summon Core.

scrapedData.title: Undertale Battle System – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This is a plugin that replicates the Bullet-hell system from Undertale.

scrapedData.title: Battle Popup Customizer – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
This plugin adds more options to the Battle Popups!
You have more customization over the attributes of the popups and also
have the ability to add custom popups.

scrapedData.title: State Popups – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
This plugin requires the Battle Popup Customizer plugin:
http://sumrndm.site/battle-popup-customizer/

scrapedData.title: Battle Background Scroll – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows the backgrounds within battles to scroll in both the X and Y directions during a battle.

scrapedData.title: Enemy Bulk Drops – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: While Yanfly’s Extra Enemy Drops adds a lot of features to help customize the drops of Enemies, it lacks a couple of features to support large amount of possible Item drops. Having the possibility for a large amount of Items to drop is a major part of larger-scale RPGs. While it is technically possible to use a lot of the features within this Plugin without it, they help a lot with making things simplier and easier.

scrapedData.title: Battle Log Upgrade – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: A somewhat simple Plugin that allows you to customize the Battle Log. Things such as position, size, order in which the logs are placed, and colors can be manipulated.

scrapedData.title: Repeat Upgrade – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Allows you to have more customization over the “Repeat” functionality of your Skills and Items, including formulas used to determine repeat count.

name: Weapon Guard Skill
description: Allows you to set a specific Guard Skill for your Actors depending on his or her weapon. (View)

name: Game Over Plugins
description: Manipulate various properties of the game over screen.

scrapedData.title: Game Over Core – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin gives more options for one’s Game Over scene. Common Events can be called and a command window has been added, allowing players to load the game, retry, or return the title screen.

scrapedData.title: Retry Upgrade – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
This plugin requires the Game Over Core plugin:
http://sumrndm.site/game-over-core/

scrapedData.title: Retry Costs – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin requires the Game Over Core.

name: Map Plugins
description: These are plugins that manipulate mechanics related to the map.

scrapedData.title: Camera Core – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows developers to preform various camera motions including focusing and zooming.

scrapedData.title: Auto Camera – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
This plugin requires the Camera Core plugin:
http://sumrndm.site/camera-core/

scrapedData.title: Smooth Camera – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
This plugin requires the Camera Core plugin:
http://sumrndm.site/camera-core/

scrapedData.title: Common Event Battle Intro – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows you to have a Common Event run as your battle intro.

scrapedData.title: Map Slip Damage – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin replaces the default Slip Damage system with a new system that gives more control over State damage that occurs on the map.

scrapedData.title: Collision Checker Plugin – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This is a plugin that allows developers to check the collision of various coordinates/directions on the map for event collision.

scrapedData.title: Picture Choices – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
This is a plugin that allows players to have the ability to select from
a collection of pictures.

scrapedData.title: Wait Options – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This is a plugin that adds more options for waiting during events.

name: Random Encounter Switches
description: Allows the user to toggle Random Encounters for predefined Maps using predefined Switches. (View)

scrapedData.title: Restrict Movement Directions – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Allows you to restrict the Player’s movement based on certain Game Switches or JavaScript conditions.

name: Character Creator
description: These are plugins related to the Character Creator plugin.

scrapedData.title: Character Creator EX – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This is a plugin that allows players to create their own custom characters in game (+more!).

scrapedData.title: Character Creator – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This is a plugin that allows players to create their own custom characters in game.

scrapedData.title: Dynamic Actors – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin requires the Character Creator plugin!

scrapedData.title: Custom Faces – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin requires the Character Creator plugin!

name: Scene Plugins
description: These are plugins that manipulate some of the less prominent scenes within one’s game.

scrapedData.title: Stat Distribution – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows players to distribute points to different stats of the Actors at his or her discretion. A command is added to the menu which allows access to a new menu for stat distribution!

scrapedData.title: Options Upgrade Plugin – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
This Plugin upgrades the Options Menu!
The options are placed into different categories and a description window
has been added.

scrapedData.title: Fullscreen Toggle Option – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Adds a Fullscreen Toggle to the Options Window.

scrapedData.title: Font Option – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin adds a Font selector to the Options Window that allows the Player to choose a Font for the game.

scrapedData.title: Equip Comparison Upgrade – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows for developers to customize all the visible stats that can be seen on the Equip Screen. Furthermore, it sets the comparison window to only show the stats that are being changed.

scrapedData.title: Character Choices – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Using this Plugin, you can allow the player to select a Character from a list of available characters. You can set an image file that contains Characters and the index of the Character you wish to use within that file.

scrapedData.title: Actor Select – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Call upon a screen that allows your Player to select an Actor. Then that Actor’s ID is stored in a variable for you to use in whichever system you wish!

scrapedData.title: Name Input Upgrade – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
UPGRADEZ DA NAME INPUT SYSTEM!!!
Pretty much the main thing is that you can use your normal keyboard to enter a name though there are many other wonderful features, check them out!

scrapedData.title: Switch Shop – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
This Plugin allows you to set up a Shop for the Player.
However, unlike normal Shops, this Shop sells Items that, when purchased, turn on a Switch.

scrapedData.title: Sell Shop – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Allows you to create a shop that gives a specific list of Items for the Player to sell to the shop. These Items can be sold for higher, or different, prices then they would normally be sold for in a normal shop.

name: Window Plugins
description: These are plugins that manipulate the capabilities or properties of windows.

scrapedData.title: Shaking Text – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Allows you to add Shaking Text to your Show Text events!

scrapedData.title: Window Skin Option – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin adds a Window Skin selector to the Options Window that allows the Player to choose a Window Skin for the game. Can also set the order of the Window Skins and have some unlock based on Switches.

scrapedData.title: Window Frame Anti-Stretch – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Makes it so instead of “stretching” the window frame, this Plugin makes it so they are repeated. Window skins that have patterns can now be used correctly.

scrapedData.title: Window Layers – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin causes all of the Windows in your game to be drawn on different layers, stopping them from overdrawing each other and creating an overlapping effect.

scrapedData.title: Custom Colors – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Instead of having the “Window.png” file have control of your colors, this Plugin allows you to customize all the available colors in your game using Parameters.

scrapedData.title: Individual Skins for Windows – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin allows you to customize the Window Skins for each individual Window within your entire game.

scrapedData.title: Window Open Upgrade – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: A Plugin that allows you to customize the animation of a Window when it opens or closes. You can change the speed along with formulas to manipulate the X/Y Scale, X/Y Position, Opacity, and Rotation.

scrapedData.title: Automatic Name Boxes – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin allows Show Text events to have “text codes” automatically added to them based on the face image used. This can mainly be used for assigning Name Boxes automatically.

name: Debug Plugins
description: These are plugins that help developers or debuggers test games.

scrapedData.title: Spell Check – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: A utility/debug Plugin that can be used to check your spelling of various texts throughout your game.

name: Other Plugins
description: These are plugins that don’t fall into any of the categories listed above.

scrapedData.title: Auto Updater Plugin – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows developers to set up automatic updates to occur whenever a player plays the game while internet is available.

scrapedData.title: Preloader Core – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows developers to preload specific audio and images before running the game through a new pre-title scene.

scrapedData.title: Data Compressor – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin allows developers to drastically reduce the file sizes of data files within their project and helps protect data files from being reopened.

scrapedData.title: Timer Upgrade – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin gives developers move control over the visual and mechanical aspects of the game’s timer system.

scrapedData.title: Master Volume – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Adds an option in the Options menu to change the game’s master volume.

scrapedData.title: Audio Fader – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin gives the developer more control over the volume fading of BGM, BGS, and ME audio effects within the game.

scrapedData.title: Bitmap Upgrade – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This plugin adds various Bitmap functions to allow color transformations to characters, battlers, and weapons.

scrapedData.title: Credits Plugin – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This is a plugin that adds an entirely new scene to your game for the purpose of giving credit!

scrapedData.title: Swipe Input – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
This is a Plugin that allows the developer to check for swipe input on the
touch screen or on a mouse.

scrapedData.title: Video Wait – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: When the user uses “Play Move”, this Plugin forces the event to stop all eventing and wait until the video is complete.

scrapedData.title: Natures – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Replicates the Nature system from Pokemon games to affect Actors.

scrapedData.title: Copy Actors – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Allows you to copy Actors to have multiple instances of the same Actor in your game.

scrapedData.title: Metronome Skill – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Adds the ability to create an easy and effective Metronome Skill.

name: Unsupported
description: This is a list of all “unsupported” plugins. These plugins still work perfectly fine; however, I will not be updating them to resolve conflict errors due to various reasons. The reason for each plugin’s lack of support is listed next to them.

scrapedData.title: Active Defense Core – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Adds a system that allows the Actors to dodge or counter Enemy attacks through the use of active inputs.

scrapedData.title: Active Defense: Charge – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Adds an Active Defense that forces the Player to charge up before dodging an attack.

scrapedData.title: TP Upgrade – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
UPGRADEZ DA TP SYSTEM!!!!
Allows you to have a dynamic Max TP stat and an Initial TP stat.
Furthermore, allows you to change a few things pertaining to the TP System as a whole.

scrapedData.title: Sequence Input – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin requires Yanfly’s Battle Engine Core and Yanfly’s Action Sequences (#1)  (#2)  (#3)

scrapedData.title: Custom Battle Intro – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Allows you to completely customize your random encounter battle intros!!

scrapedData.title: Movie Credits – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
Shows credits in a similar fashion to how movies display them at the end.
They appear as a centered list that moves from the bottom of the screen to the top.

scrapedData.title: Shaking Windows – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
Makes your windows with commands shake when the Player is selecting a command.
Adds a sort of animation to what would normally be boring windows.

scrapedData.title: Blinking Faces – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Using this Plugin, you can make it so the character face images on the dialogue boxes within your game have “blinking” animations.

scrapedData.title: Debug Display – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Allows you to view a whole ton of random information while you are playtesting your amazing game!

scrapedData.title: Debug Speed Up – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Using this Plugin, you can speed up your game up to ten times the normal speed while you are playtesting it.

scrapedData.title: Variable Rates – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Adds the ability to increase/decrease a Game Variable(s) by a specified amount every specified amount of frames.

scrapedData.title: Timed Attack Core – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin adds a system which forces the user to time certain inputs to preform Skills during battle. The better the input is preformed, the more effective the Skill is.

scrapedData.title: Timed Attack: Circle – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Requires Timed Attack Core

scrapedData.title: Timed Attack: Clock – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Requires Timed Attack Core

scrapedData.title: Timed Attack: Mash – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Requires Timed Attack Core

scrapedData.title: Timed Attack: Arrows – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Requires Timed Attack Core

scrapedData.title: Timed Attack: Wheel – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Requires Timed Attack Core

scrapedData.title: Timed Attack: Results – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Requires Timed Attack Core

scrapedData.title: Timed Attack: Action Sequences – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: Requires Timed Attack Core and Yanfly’s Battle Engine Core

scrapedData.title: Pokemon 4 Moves Only – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
Very simple: this Plugin forces your Actors to only have 4 Skills.
On an attempt to obtain any more, they are given a screen and forced to delete one.
This is one more step to making the ultimate Pokemon game!

scrapedData.title: Pokemon Move Deleter – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
An extension Plugin to SRD_PKM_4MovesOnly!
Allows you to call upon a screen to select an Actor and delete a Skill from that Actor.
Can even delete undeleteable moves!

scrapedData.title: Pokemon Trainer Sprite – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin was based off of the Independent Character Sprite.

scrapedData.title: Pokemon Type System – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This is a Plugin that adds the Pokemon Types system into your game.

scrapedData.title: Pokemon Type Display – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description:
An extension Plugin to SRD_PKM_TypeSystem (1.01+)
Using this Plugin, the place where usually the Actor’s Class is located is replaced with the Actor’s Elements.

scrapedData.title: Pokemon Trainer Name Input – MV Plugin
scrapedData.description: This Plugin allows you to set up an input box for a Trainer’s name without having to create an Actor for the Trainer. It displays an animated walking sprite in the top corner as opposed to the face image, and allows for fluidity between the display options of Male and Female!

name: MZ
description: List of plugins for RPG Maker MZ.

scrapedData.title: HUD Maker Ultra – MZ Tool & Plugin
scrapedData.description: More Information

scrapedData.title: Window Frame Anti-Stretch – MZ Plugin
scrapedData.description: Screenshots

scrapedData.title: Outside Map Events – MZ Plugin
scrapedData.description: This is mainly for making map transitions that work by PUSHING into the edge of the map instead of just stepping on an event.

scrapedData.title: Stretch Event Trigger – MZ Plugin
scrapedData.description: Useful for making an event that takes up multiple times, but only need to use it in one spot.

scrapedData.title: Map Mixer – MZ Plugin
scrapedData.description: With X being the ID to the map this will mix with.
